Skip to main content

[Watch the Exam Preparation Video Series on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLb4F9bHWtedQ6gRMWZJWdqbLrsAsvbKKI)

Get the most out of the time leading up to your exam. Studying and preparing are important, and there are lots of resources to help you. 

Note: the information and resources on this page are intended as a guide only. SkilledTradesBC is not responsible for the quality or accuracy of the content.

## 

Exam Resources

Trade Page

Your trade page contains exam resources specific to your trade and is the best place to start when preparing for your exam. 

Search for your trade using [Find Your Trade](/find-your-trade) and review the E**xam Information and Resources section** (often near the middle of the page) to find: 

  * Exam breakdowns

  * Interprovincial Red Seal Examination information 

  * Formulas, codebooks, acronym lists




Also check out the **Program Outline** on the page for a detailed breakdown of your trade’s program, including level-specific content, reference materials and a list of essential tools and equipment.

Red Seal Program Website

If you are writing an Interprovincial Red Seal Examination, the [Red Seal website](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/welcome.shtml) is a useful tool with many resources. 

This website includes the following resources:

  * [Self-assessment tool](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/resources/selfexamlist.shtml)

  * [Exam breakdowns](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/resources/.2x.1ms_c.4.5ns.2ll.3ng.shtml)

  * [Exam Preparation Guide](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/resources/g.2tr.2.1dy.shtml)

  * [Sample exam questions](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/resources/s.1mpl.2_q.5.2st.3.4ns.shtml)




Each [Red Seal trade page](https://www.red-seal.ca/eng/trades/tr.1d.2s_l.3st.shtml) provides trade-specific exam information, as well as helpful resources such as Mathematical Formulas and Acronyms. 

Other Websites and Study Support

**Free Math Resources**

  * [Trade Skills for Success: Numeracy](https://pressbooks.bccampus.ca/tradeskillsforsuccessnumeracy/)
  * [Purple Math](http://purplemath.com/)



**Practice Exams**

  * [CSA Group – Construction Electrician](https://www.csagroup.org/store/product/2430648/)
  * [CSA Group – ](https://www.csagroup.org/store/product/2431431/)[Gasfitter – Class B](https://www.csagroup.org/store/product/2431431/)



****

**Miscellaneous Resources**

  * [IPT Training Manuals](http://www.iptbooks.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=category&layout=blog&id=43&Itemid=72) \- Various trades 
  * [BCcampus Open Collection – various trades (free online textbooks)](https://collection.bccampus.ca/concept/subject/trades)



Refresher Courses

Refresher courses can supplement technical training, on-the-job training and independent study to help you prepare for your certification exam.

While SkilledTradesBC provides guidance on standards relevant to some of these refresher courses, the quality and accuracy of refresher courses are the responsibility of the training providers. You can also search for refresher courses at [Trades Training BC](https://www.tradestrainingbc.ca/). 

  * [British Columbia Institute of Technology (BCIT)](https://www.bcit.ca/study/trades-apprenticeships/courses/)
  * [Kwantlen Polytechnic University (KPU)](https://www.kpu.ca/cps/trades)
  * [Okanagan College](https://www.okanagan.bc.ca/trades-and-apprenticeship/trades-continuing-studies#iprefreshers)
  * [Thompson Rivers University](https://www.tru.ca/trades/continuing-studies/red-seal-challenge-preparation.html)[ (TRU)](https://www.tru.ca/trades/continuing-studies/red-seal-challenge-preparation.html)
  * [Vancouver Community College (VCC)](https://continuingstudies.vcc.ca/public/category/programStream.do?method=load&selectedProgramAreaId=4410960&selectedProgramStreamId=4410964)



Videos

Our [Exam Preparation video series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLb4F9bHWtedQ6gRMWZJWdqbLrsAsvbKKI) will help guide you through each step of the exam preparation process. Check out the following short videos below to get started:

  * [Step 1: Gather Your Exam Resources ](https://youtu.be/KHMWW2ooK5Q)

  * [Step 2: Create a Study Plan That Works for You](https://youtu.be/-q90BOaidhM)

  * [Step 3: Book Your Exam and Request Accommodations](https://youtu.be/x7fwYpciH5I)

  * [Step 4: Prepare for Exam Day](https://youtu.be/rLkLNf_jJkQ)

  * [Step 5: Exam Results and Next Steps](https://youtu.be/M0I4HkU4vM4)




## 

Need More Help?

If you have questions or would like to learn more about available exam and study support, contact [Customer Service](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/contact-us). 

Exam Accommodations

SkilledTradesBC can offer accommodations, based on your needs, to help you complete exams.

[ Learn More](/exam-accommodations)

![](/sites/default/files/2022-12/fotografierende-333oj7zFsdg-unsplash.jpg)

What to Expect on Exam Day

There are several ways to ensure you’re prepared and know what to expect before exam day.

[ Learn More](/what-to-expect-on-exam-day)
